comprehensive_overview: Eckit is a C++ library developed by the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) that provides essential components for building high-performance, efficient and flexible software for Earth system modelling and data assimilation.
core_features: Provides fundamental building blocks for developing Earth system models
Includes classes for handling dates, times, arrays, geometry, configuration, and more
Offers tools for dealing with I/O operations, logging, parallelization, and configuration
Designed for high performance and adaptability in the context of weather and climate modelling
